about_the_game:
Box World: Space Courier is a simple RTS game.

Game Content

Build Worker House on mine to get Money.
Cost Money to build turret to defense your Base.
Cost Money to build to add progress

Game Story

In 2027, after receiving the "remains" that suddenly landed on the earth, human beings have successfully colonized many habitable planets, and the rapidly expanding population problem has been greatly alleviated. The mother planet that once had 7.8 billion people now only lives 5 billion Aboriginal people. In order to help the newly reclaimed colonial stars flourish, as a independent youth in the new era, you are graduating and you decide to become a space delivery man and build a bridge for each planets.

How to play

WASD | Camera Move
QE | Camera Rotation
Scroll | Camera Zoom
Left Click | Build/Check
ESC | Quit the Game
